person.name: Keith K. Hilbig
person.description: Elder Keith K. Hilbig was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 1, 2006. He had previously served for five years in the Second Quorum. Prior to that time, he was an Area Seventy, serving in the Third and Fifth Quorums of the Seventy (which encompassed the Europe West and North America West Areas). Since becoming a General Authority, he has been a member of presidencies in the Europe East Area, North America Northwest Area, and Pacific Area. He has also served as the Executive Director of the Audiovisual Department and Assistant Executive Director of the Curriculum Department, the Scriptures Committee, and the Restoration and Cancellation Committee.
